frozen_inputs.policy: Indices and split manifest are treated as immutable for Experiment 1. Do not regenerate unless the dataset changes.

threshold_sweep.selection_rule: Choose the confidence threshold that maximizes F1 on the validation split.

test_reporting.policy: Report final test metrics at the selected validation threshold. Do not select thresholds on test.

notes: Export predictions with low confidence cutoff (prediction_export_conf_low) so the evaluator can sweep thresholds post-hoc.
The evaluator consumes predictions JSON + *_index.json ground truth, not Ultralytics val() summaries.
